name: Dinosaur Pervade: FPS Survival
description:
Dinosaur Pervade: FPS Survival is a full 3D First Person shooter action game. You're a hero survivor walking in an incredible and a huge natural environment, where your mission is to stay alive. In this exciting dinosaur game only one winner, you or your enemies - ruthless bloodthirsty dinosaurs.
Features:
- High-Quality HD graphics.
- Exciting game modes.
- Many of sniper guns and unlimited munitions and explosive.
- Real naturel graphics
- Scary and seems real
